column2: "Nyankopɔn hu hɛn mbɔbɔr na hyira hɛn
column3: Ma w'enyim ntsew wɔ hɛn do."
Na wo nkwahosan wɔ amanaman nyinara mu."

column4: ma aman nyi wo ayɛw; Ma aman nyinara nyi wo ayɛw."

column2: "Ma amanaman enyi ngye na wɔntow ehurusi ndwom: Na ɔwo ibobu aman ntsɛntsenenee
column3: Na akyerɛ asaase do amanaman kwan."
Nyankopɔn; Ma aman nyinara nyi wo ayɛw."

column2: "Nyankopɔn behyira hɛn; Ama asaaseanofo nyinara eesuro no."
